# Emitter Render Order

**API Collection**

These constants specify the order that emitter cells are composited. They are used by the [doc://com.apple.quartzcore/documentation/QuartzCore/CAEmitterLayer/renderMode] property.

## Constants

- **unordered**: Particles are rendered unordered. This mode uses source-over compositing.
- **oldestFirst**: Particles are rendered oldest first. This mode uses source-over compositing.
- **oldestLast**: Particles are rendered oldest last. This mode uses source-over compositing.
- **backToFront**: Particles are rendered from back to front, sorted by z-position. This mode uses source-over compositing.
- **additive**: The particles are rendered using source-additive compositing.

## Constants

- **Emitter Shape**: The emission shape is a one, two or three dimensional shape that defines where the emitted particles originate. The shapes are defined by a subset of [doc://com.apple.quartzcore/documentation/QuartzCore/CAEmitterLayer/emitterPosition], [doc://com.apple.quartzcore/documentation/QuartzCore/CAEmitterLayer/emitterZPosition], [doc://com.apple.quartzcore/documentation/QuartzCore/CAEmitterLayer/emitterSize] and [doc://com.apple.quartzcore/documentation/QuartzCore/CAEmitterLayer/emitterDepth] properties.
- **Emitter Modes**: These constants specify the possible emitter modes. They are used by the [doc://com.apple.quartzcore/documentation/QuartzCore/CAEmitterLayer/emitterMode] property.
